name: Noosphere Stroll
description:
Picture a bed.

A bed would be really nice right about now, right? You could use some sleep.

Noosphere Stroll is a interactive computer game for your computer. that offers a short glimpse of the hypnagogic realms that we wander into during our bedtimes.

Your goal is to guide the brave Noosphere Explorer (You) through the dream while avoiding the dangers contained therein.

Created for LSDJAM 2022, the following computer game experience contains:

-8 types of hostile beings

-Some non-hostile beings

-Many trees and houses

-Swing around in a grappling hook-esque fashion (maybe)

Controls

Use the WASD keys to move the brave Noosphere Explorer in the dream

Use Left Click to attack with the Noosphere Explorer's teeth

Use Right Click when you have enough power to unleash a special ability

Use Shift to move the Noosphere Explorer on the vertical axis (What Earthly beings often call a "jump")

Use ESC to bring up a useful menu with many useful amenities and tools, and to prematurely abort the simulation
Walk up to peaceful beings to hear what they have to say
